corner_radius.rationale: Outer corners use 2dp radius for friendliness, inner corners stay square for clarity

line_treatment.maintain_clarity: Lines must not create visual confusion when crossing

angle_resolution.rationale: Prefer 45° and 90° angles for geometric clarity and grid alignment

grid_alignment.rationale: All coordinates must be whole numbers for crisp rendering

validation_rules: All stroke colors must be #000000 or black
Line segments must be at least 4dp long
No overlapping strokes that create confusion
